trap.name: The Screaming Idol
trap.trigger: Touching or removing the idol from its pedestal.
trap.effect: Emits a deafening sonic pulse, dealing 3d8 thunder damage in a 30ft radius.

countermeasures.countermeasure: Detect Magic reveals faint transmutation energy.
Disarming requires a successful DC 16 Arcana check.
